entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Longueuil
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:31 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
